name: quorum-coding-challenge
description: This project is a **full-stack web application** built with **React (Vite) for the frontend** and **Express.js for the backend**. The goal is to process and display legislative data from CSV files, answering key questions about bills and legislators.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
